data.message: Help, our page administrator has left the company and did not leave a password. How do we change to a new admin?

replies.message: Hi Nancy. Unfortunately Facebook doesn't handle admin disputes. The only way that you will be able to gain a role on the Page is if the current admin grants you an admin role. Please contact the Page's current admin for access: http://bit.ly/2zai9Wq. -Tenaya

I was hacked by Melissa Gilbert. Claim to be. Said my name had been picked by a computer from Facebook. That 10 people had been picked. And that We won $1,000,000USD. Each. Had a Facebook cover showed Facebook debit card. Would you please check into this?
Still is on my Facebook messenger.
❤️love Facebook. Please don't cut us when writing against Socialismo/COMUNISMO please. Thanks 🙏.
Thank you Facebook my account is fine.i only use a simple thing.thanks again.

Hi Shirley. If you've received a message saying that you're a winner of a Facebook lottery or that you've won money from Facebook, we ask that you not respond to it. These messages are part of a scam. Please report the message to us by following these simple steps: http://bit.ly/2AlKyIJ. -Anna
Thanks I will try to block
